__comment__: This file was automatically created by mcresources
name: Hangers

pages.text: The $(thing)Hanger$() is a device for storing meat or garlic. It can only be used in a valid $(l:firmalife:firmalife/cellar)Cellar$(). Food shelves can contain a full stack of one item. Adding and removing the item can be done with $(item)$(k:key.use)$(). Items in valid food shelves receive a decay modifier that is better than shelves or vessels.
The hanger is made from planks and string.
